name: Openworld
description:
You have decided to purchase your first home in the nearby village. As a child, you spent many summer holidays here and have fond memories of it. Once the purchase has gone through and you move in, you realise that the village is not as you remember it. There are fewer residents now, a lot of businesses have shut up shop, and the village has fallen somewhat into disrepair. It is now up to you to rebuild and restore the village!

Openworld was created as our 2nd year University Project, with a development cycle of 14weeks. Any feedback is much appreciated!

Created by:
